name: DatasetsMerge
description: Merges multiple datasets into a single dataset. Requires that the datasets have the same schema (variable names, types, dimensions).

inputParameters.name: root_folder
inputParameters.description: Path to the folder containing the datasets to merge.

inputParameters.name: new_dataset_name
inputParameters.description: Name of the merged dataset. (Optional, default: 'merged_dataset'.)

inputParameters.name: samples_per_file
inputParameters.description: Number of samples to be saved in each file of the new dataset. (Optional, default: 1000.)
